params.name: consumer_group
params.label: Consumer Group
params.description: The consumer group to send requests to. The default for deployed TitanML models is 'primary', but if you have multiple models on the same server you must assign each to a consumer group. Leave empty to set the default value of 'primary'

params.name: jsonSchema
params.label: Json Schema
params.description: JSON Schema to constrain every input to

params.name: regexScheme
params.label: Regex String
params.description: Regex string to constrain every input to.

params.name: snowflake_token
params.label: Snowflake Token
params.description:
Auth token to send to snowflake. For example, if you usually use the header 
{'Authorization': 'Snowflake Token="ver:1-hint:xxxxxx"'}, here you would enter `ver:1-hint:xxxxxx`
